patterns: why was the 2022 fifa world cup not held in June and July as usual?
why was there a change in an event of world cup 2022?
why was there a change in an event
Schedule Change
theory behind the world cup  being held in winter of november and december
which month was world Cup event was organised?
event was organised
can you share me a little fun fact about world cup 2022?
responses: The 2022 FIFA World Cup was not held in June and July, as is typical, due to Qatar's intense summer heat and high humidity. Instead, it was played in November and December.

patterns: how much did each qualified team receive for preparation costs?

responses: Each qualified team for the 2022 World Cup received 1.5 million  USD before the competition to cover preparation costs.Each team participating in the 2022 World Cup received at least $9 million in prize money.

patterns: what was the total prize pool for the world Cup 2022
how did the 2022 world cup prize pool compare to the previous tournament
was the price pool has an increament or increase
responses: The total prize pool for the 2022 World Cup was 440 million USD. The prize pool for the 2022 World Cup was $40 million greater than the prize pool of the previous tournament.

patterns: how was the total prize of 440 million usd distributed among the 32 teams?
what was the price distribution of world cup 2022
responses: The total prize of 440 million USD was distributed among the 32 teams with varying amounts depending on their final standing in the tournament, ranging from 9 million USD for group stage teams to 42 million USD for the champions.

patterns: what were the new substitution rules in the tournament?what was the new rule regarding concussion substitutions in the tournament?
responses: In the tournament, teams could make up to five substitutions in normal time, and an additional substitution in extra time. The tournament was the first World Cup to feature concussion substitutions, allowing each team to use a maximum of one concussion substitute during a match, which did not count towards the team's quota of regular substitutions.

patterns: who was the first player to be replaced by a dedicated concussion substitute in this world cup?
responses: Iranian goalkeeper Alireza Beiranvand was the first player to be replaced by a dedicated concussion substitute in this World Cup, after suffering a concussion in the opening match against England.

patterns: when did the bidding procedure of 2022 fifa world cups begin?
when did the bidding start or begin
responses: The bidding procedure to host the 2018 and 2022 FIFA World Cups began in January 2009.National associations had until 2 February 2009 to register their interest in hosting the 2018 and 2022 FIFA World Cups.

patterns: what was the deadline for national associations to register interest in hosting the world cups?
responses: The bidding procedure to host the 2018 and 2022 FIFA World Cups began in January 2009.National associations had until 2 February 2009 to register their interest in hosting the 2018 and 2022 FIFA World Cups.
